block.p: Christine Elizabeth Bolmen and Steven John Farmer were married on Friday by the Rev. Craig Beeker, a Lutheran minister, at the Hans Fahden Winery in Calistoga, Calif.

Mrs. Farmer, 36, is an account manager in San Francisco for the advertising department of The New York Times. She graduated from San Diego State University. She is the daughter of Mary Lou Bolmen of Alameda, Calif., and Lawrence Rentler of Page, Ariz.
Christine Elizabeth Bolmen and Steven John Farmer were married on Friday by the Rev. Craig Beeker, a Lutheran minister, at the Hans Fahden Winery in Calistoga, Calif.

Mrs. Farmer, 36, is an account manager in San Francisco for the advertising department of The New York Times. She graduated from San Diego State University. She is the daughter of Mary Lou Bolmen of Alameda, Calif., and Lawrence Rentler of Page, Ariz.

Mr. Farmer, 35, is an account manager in Alameda for BioReliance Inc., a company that does testing and manufacturing for biotechnology companies. He graduated from Ohio State University, from which he also received a master's degree in cell and molecular biology and an M.B.A. degree. His parents, Donna and Gerald Farmer, live in Pemberville, Ohio.
